description: The Defence Ministry said high-precision air-based missiles had struck near the Udachne railway station. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Russia says it destroyed US, European weapons in eastern Ukraine
title_page: Russia says it destroyed US, European weapons in eastern Ukraine | The Straits Times
maintext:
MOSCOW (REUTERS) - Russia's Defence Ministry said on Monday (June 13) its missiles had destroyed a large quantity of weapons and military equipment in Ukraine's eastern Donbas region, including some that had been sent by the United States and European nations.
The ministry said high-precision air-based missiles had struck near the Udachne railway station, hitting equipment that had been delivered to Ukrainian forces.
